34.Title: Weather Underground
34.Description: Current weather, forecast and other infos like sunrise/sunset, wind, precipitations. Based on Weather Underground service. To activate this widget specify a valid user Key that can be obtained creating an account from http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/login.html
34.ConfigureOptions.InputDisplayCelsius: Display Temperature in degrees Celsius (TRUE=YES FALSE=NO)

6.Title: All lights on
6.Description: Turn on all lights in the selected group.

7.Title: All lights off
7.Description: Turn off all lights in the selected group.

81.Title: Energy Monitor
81.Description: Collects and display information about device status and energy consumption.

82.Title: Energy Saving Mode
82.Description: When enabled, ensures that dimmer level is kept below the configured percentage value.

16.Title: Level Memory
16.Description: Store and recall last dimmer level.
16.HomeGenie.LevelMemory: Recall last light level when switched on

35.Title: Scheduled On/Off
35.Description: Turn on/off a device using the scheduler.

90.Title: Security Alarm System
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Comma separated list of recipients e-mails for alarm notifications

145.Title: Smart Lights
145.Description: Control device by motion detection and enviroment light.
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.MinLuminance: Turn on if luminance is below:

8.Title: Sunrise Colors Scenario
8.Description: Example scenario for Philips Hue lights.

36.Title: Timetable
36.TimeTable.Repeat: Repeat command for the whole duration

112.Title: Automatic turn off
112.Description: When device is turned on, automatically turn it off after a given delay.

200.Title: Windows Phone Push Notification Service
200.Description: Sends toast and tile updates to Windows Phone client.
200.MobileNotification.SendChanges: Push notifications to Windows Phone Client
